Title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society
Writer: Shirow Masamune (comic), Kenji Kamiyama (screenplay), Shotaro Suga (screenplay), Yoshiki Sakurai (screenplay)
Actors: Atsuko Tanaka, Osamu Saka, Akio Ôtsuka, Kôichi Yamadera
Plot: A.D. 2034. It has been two years since Motoko Kusanagi left Section 9. Togusa is now the new leader of the team, that has considerably increased its appointed personnel. The expanded new Section 9 confronts a rash of complicated incidents, and investigations reveal that an ultra-wizard hacker nicknamed the "Puppet Master" is behind the entire series of events.
